articles.author: Scharon Harding
articles.title: HP’s EliteBoard G1a is a Ryzen-powered Windows 11 PC in a membrane keyboard - Ars Technica
articles.description: The most familiar, full-fledged PC experience you can get from a keyboard.

articles.title: Lucid, Nuro, and Uber Unveil Global Robotaxi at CES, Announce Autonomous On-Road Testing - Lucid Motors
articles.description: Lucid Group, Inc. (NASDAQ: LCID), Nuro, Inc. (“Nuro”), and Uber Technologies, Inc. (NYSE: UBER), today unveiled the production intent vehicles that will be used in their global robotaxi service and introduced the Uber-designed in-cabin rider experience for th…
articles.content:
• Industry's most luxurious robotaxi, offering riders an unprecedented in-cabin experience
  • Autonomous on-road testing, led by Nuro, began in December, marking an important milestone in … [+9114 chars]
